      • MapTile

        public MapTile(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion texture,
       int x,
       int y,
       int type,
       com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShapeRenderer debugRenderer)
        Quick Contructor, doesn'T needto use setType after that.
        Parameters:
        texture - the texture of the tile
        x - the x coordinate in the matrix
        y - the y coordinate in the matrix
        type - the type of the tile, look in the static variables for types
